LanguageData.unruly_Blueprint.label: Donkey
LanguageData.unruly_Blueprint.description:
From the all-Rimerican line of muscle cars comes the middle generation Rebel. Too contemporary to be a classic, too old-school to be cutting edge, this is the kind of car you forget all about until it punches you square in the junk. Now pony up. 

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Passenger x1
<color=#bb8f04>Power:</color> Chemfuel
